["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"软件源","children":"软件源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist"}],"，在文件的最顶端添加以下配置；您可以同时注释掉其它所有镜像。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist","code":"Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$arch/$repo","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"更新软件包缓存："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pacman -Syy","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"系统镜像","children":"系统镜像"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请访问 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms"}],"，阅读硬件平台对应的安装指引并下载对应的系统镜像。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Arch Linux ARM 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
